data.trans: Bất tỉnh trong chốc lát, ngất
data.trans_hint: Cô ấy bất tỉnh trong chốc lát do cú sốc.
data.en_hint: She blacked out for a moment because of the shock.
data.content_game_1: She blacked out for a moment because of the shock.
data.answer_en_hint: She blacked out for a moment because of the shock.

data.trans: Tỉnh lại (sau khi ngất), qua khỏi (bệnh)
data.trans_hint: Mẹ cô ấy vẫn chưa qua khỏi cơn hôn mê.
data.en_hint: Her mother hasn't yet come around from the coma.
data.content_game_1: Her mother hasn't yet come around from the coma.
data.answer_en_hint: Her mother hasn't yet come around from the coma.

data.trans_hint: Cuối cùng, mưa cũng bắt đầu dịu bớt.
data.en_hint: At last, the rain began to ease off.
data.content_game_1: At last, the rain began to ease off.
data.answer_en_hint: At last, the rain began to ease off.

data.trans: Ngay cả trong điều kiện tốt nhất
data.trans_hint: Cô ấy vẫn cảm thấy không khỏe ngay cả trong điều kiện tốt nhất.
data.en_hint: She still feels unwell even at the best of times.
data.content_game_1: She still feels unwell even at the best of times.
data.answer_en_hint: She still feels unwell even at the best of times.

data.trans_hint: Đứa bé bật khóc khi nhìn thấy bơm tiêm.
data.en_hint: The child burst into tears when he saw the syringe.
data.content_game_1: The child burst into tears when he saw the syringe.
data.answer_en_hint: The child burst into tears when he saw the syringe.

data.trans_hint: Ai đó hãy trấn an bệnh nhân đó lại trước khi anh ta làm loạn lên.
data.en_hint: Someone needs to calm that patient down before he messes things up.
data.content_game_1: Someone needs to calm that patient down before he messes things up.
data.answer_en_hint: Someone needs to calm that patient down before he messes things up.

data.trans_hint: Bác sỹ quyết định kiểm tra kỹ càng tình trạng của ông ta để chắc chắn ông ta hoàn toàn khỏe mạnh.
data.en_hint: The doctor decided to check his condition over to make sure that he is totally fine.
data.content_game_1: The doctor decided to check his condition over to make sure that he is totally fine.
data.answer_en_hint: The doctor decided to check his condition over to make sure that he is totally fine.

data.trans_hint: Vết sưng tấy do phẫu thuật cần ít nhất vài ngày để bớt sưng (thường là 5 đến 7 ngày).
data.en_hint: Swelling due to a surgery can take at least several days to go down (often 5 to 7 days).
data.content_game_1: Swelling due to a surgery can take at least several days to go down (often 5 to 7 days).
data.answer_en_hint: Swelling due to a surgery can take at least several days to go down (often 5 to 7 days).

data.trans: Lấy thứ gì ra (khỏi cơ thể, thông qua phẫu thuật)
data.trans_hint: Bác sĩ phẫu thuật mất gần 2 tiếng để lấy mẩu dị vật ra khỏi cơ thể cậu bé.
data.en_hint: The surgeon spent almost 2 hours having that piece of strange thing out of that boy's body.
data.content_game_1: The surgeon spent almost 2 hours having that piece of strange thing out of that boy's body.
data.answer_en_hint: The surgeon spent almost 2 hours having that piece of strange thing out of that boy's body.

data.trans_hint: Vì bận bịu hơn, nên tôi cần thuê bảo mẫu trông nom con trai tôi vào ban ngày.
data.en_hint: As I'm getting busier, I need to hire a nanny to look after my son in the daylight.
data.content_game_1: As I'm getting busier, I need to hire a nanny to look after my son in the daylight.
data.answer_en_hint: As I'm getting busier, I need to hire a nanny to look after my son in the daylight.

data.trans_hint: Mặt anh ta nhăn nhó trong đau đớn khi y tá đang khâu lại vết cắt.
data.en_hint: He winced in pain when the nurse was stitching his cut up.
data.content_game_1: He winced in pain when the nurse was stitching his cut up.
data.answer_en_hint: He winced in pain when the nurse was stitching his cut up.

data.trans: Lấy thứ gì ra (khỏi cơ thể)
data.trans_hint: Khi nhận ra mình đã uống nhầm thuốc, tôi đã lấy nó ra ngay lập tức bằng cách móc họng.
data.en_hint: When having realized that I took the wrong pill, I took it out immediately by sticking the finger down my throat.
data.content_game_1: When having realized that I took the wrong pill, I took it out immediately by sticking the finger down my throat.
data.answer_en_hint: When having realized that I took the wrong pill, I took it out immediately by sticking the finger down my throat.
